metadata.source: A. Scharpé: Kalidasa Lexicon, Vol. 1, Brugge 1964 (Rijksuniversiteit te Gent, Werken uitgegeven door de Faculteit van de Letteren en Wijsbegeerte, 134)

children.text: sa tvam ekāntarāṃ tasyā madīyāṃ vatsa mātaram
prayuktam apy astram ito vṛthā syāt
hāsyaṃ vacas tad yad ahaṃ vivakṣuḥ
navaṃ yayaḥ kāntam idaṃ vapuś ca
ṛddhaṃ hi rājyaṃ padam aindram āhuḥ
kim apy ahiṃsyas tava cen mato 'haṃ
atha nayanasamutthaṃ jyotir atrer iva dyauḥ
na me hriyā śaṃsati kiṃcid īpsitaṃ
yad eva vavre tad apaśyad āhṛtam
tathā nṛpaḥ sā cu sutena māgadhī
dvitīyagāmī na hi śabda eṣa naḥ
na khalv anirjitya raghuṃ kṛtī bhav
kim atra citraṃ yadi kāmasūr bhūr
rūpaṃ tad ojasvi tad eva vīryaṃ
alaṃ hriyā māṃ prati yan muhūrtaṃ
rātrir gatā matimatāṃ vara muñca śayyāṃ
dhātrā dvidhaiva nanu dhūr jagato vibhaktā
kiṃ vā ripūṃs tava guruḥ svayam ucchinatti
ayam api ca giraṃ nas tvatprabodhaprayuktām
asmin dvayaṃ śrīś ca sarasvatī ca
nāsau na kāmyo na ca veda samyag
draṣṭuṃ na sā bhinnarucir hi lokaḥ
tāv eva sūtau rathinau ca kaucit
iti śirasi sa vāmaṃ pādam ādhāya rājñām
na hi sati kuladhurye sūryavaṃśyā gṛhāya
sa hi tasya na kevalāṃ śriyaṃ
na kharo na ca bhūyasā mṛduḥ
na tu sarpa iva tvacaṃ punaḥ
hṛdaye kiṃ nihitā na hanti mām
madhu pītvā rasavat kathaṃ nu me
samatītaṃ ca bhavac ca bhāvi ca
taṃ pātayāṃ prathamam āsa papāta paścāt
ucchritaṃ na mamṛṣe na tu dīrgham āyuḥ
tau daṃpatī bahu vilapya śiśoḥ prahartrā
itthaṃ gate gataghṛṇaḥ kim ayaṃ vidhattāṃ
harir iva yugadīrghair dorbhir aṃṣais tadīyaiḥ
netum aicchad ṛṣir ity asau nṛpaḥ
snehād amanyata pitā punar eva jātam
taṃ mārgam etāḥ kṛpayā latā me
tām ūcatus te priyam apy amithyā
bhrātrā yad itthaṃ paravān asi tvam
syād rakṣaṇīyaṃ yadi me na tejas
tvam eva bhartā na ca viprayogaḥ
kīrtistambhadvayam iva girau dakṣiṇe cottare ca
kā tvaṃ śubhe kasya parigraho vā
sehe 'sya na bhraṃśam ato na lobhāt
kṛtaḥ prayatno na ca deva labdhaṃ
labdhvā bandhuṃ tam api ca kuśaḥ pañcamaṃ takṣakasya
rājñī rājyaṃ vidhivad aśiṣad bhartur avyāhatājñā
